attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown does not have a mandate as an elected Prime Minister. His authority is thus weakened and he is having to make U-Turns and concessions because he lacks the backing of the public.  We deserve a Government that is able to implement their policy, not a lame duck.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
